item.title: Old
item.description: SKILLS Segment 2D images Build 3D fonts Design 3D manipulator for the target application Repair 3D meshes enable 3D printing Compose boolean operations of 3D meshes in order to build a complex 3D object. Use the algorithms in ITK (Insignt Toolkit), VTK (Visualization Toolkit) software packages and port them Design hybrid volume-geometry rendering Reduce the dimensionality of large data sets using PCA (Principal Component Analysis) Register two-point clouds using ICP (Interative closest point) algorithm Interpolate 3D motion with polynomial equations over quaternions Interpolate spline curves and solve the related problem using their Frenet frame.
